LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeEMP.description: Electromagnetic pulse grenades damaging to electronic equipment. Can temporally disable shield belts or to stun turrets & mechanoids.\n\nHas no effect and is not very effective against living organisms such as humanoids or animal creatures.
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeFrag.description: Old-school fragmentation hand grenades. They can be thrown at a short distance, where they'll explode, damaging anything caught in it's small blast radius\n\nEffective against stationary targets, but is not very effective at destroying structures.
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeMolotov.description: Bottles filled with flammable liquid, with a burning cloth in the neck. Can effectively burn wooden walls, grass or to flush enemies out of cover.\n\nA favorite weapon of hooligans, desperate warriors & partisans in the rims & in war-torn worlds.
